021import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
022import net.tnemc.core.config.MessageConfig;
023import net.tnemc.core.transaction.tax.TaxEntry;
024import net.tnemc.item.AbstractItemStack;
025import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
026
027import java.math.BigDecimal;
028import java.util.ArrayList;
029import java.util.LinkedList;
030import java.util.List;
031
032/**
033 * Represents a currency note object, which is a way to make virtual balances into a physical note
034 * to be traded or stored in a chest.
035 *
036 * @author creatorfromhell
037 * @since 0.1.2.0
038 */
039public class Note {
040
041  final TaxEntry fee;
042  private final List<String> flags = new ArrayList<>();
043  private final List<String> enchantments = new ArrayList<>();
044  private String material;
045  private BigDecimal minimum;
046  private int customModelData;
047  private String texture;
048
049  public Note(final String material, final BigDecimal minimum, final String fee) {
050
051    this.material = material;
052    this.minimum = minimum;
053
054    if(fee.contains("%")) {
055      this.fee = new TaxEntry("percent", Double.parseDouble(fee.replace("%", "")) / 100);
056    } else {
057      this.fee = new TaxEntry("flat", Double.parseDouble(fee));
058    }
059  }
060
061  public Note(final String material, final BigDecimal minimum, final TaxEntry fee) {
062
063    this.material = material;
064    this.minimum = minimum;
065    this.fee = fee;
066  }
067
068  public BigDecimal getMinimum() {
069
070    return minimum;
071  }
072
073  public void setMinimum(final BigDecimal minimum) {
074
075    this.minimum = minimum;
076  }
077
078  public TaxEntry getFee() {
079
080    return fee;
081  }
082
083  public List<String> getFlags() {
084
085    return flags;
086  }
087
088  public void setFlags(final List<String> flags) {
089
090    this.flags.clear();
091    for(final String str : flags) {
092      if(!str.isEmpty()) {
093        this.flags.add(str);
094      }
095    }
096  }
097
098  public List<String> getEnchantments() {
099
100    return enchantments;
101  }
102
103  public void setEnchantments(final List<String> enchantments) {
104
105    this.enchantments.clear();
106    for(final String str : enchantments) {
107      if(!str.isEmpty()) {
108        this.enchantments.add(str);
109      }
110    }
111  }
112
113  public String getMaterial() {
114
115    return material;
116  }
117
118  public void setMaterial(final String material) {
119
120    this.material = material;
121  }
122
123  public int getCustomModelData() {
124
125    return customModelData;
126  }
127
128  public void setCustomModelData(final int customModelData) {
129
130    this.customModelData = customModelData;
131  }
132
133  public String getTexture() {
134
135    return texture;
136  }
137
138  public void setTexture(final String texture) {
139
140    this.texture = texture;
141  }
142
143  public AbstractItemStack<Object> stack(final String currency, final String region, final BigDecimal amount) {
144
145    final LinkedList<Component> lore = new LinkedList<>();
146    lore.add(Component.text(MessageConfig.yaml().getString("Messages.Note.Currency").replace("$currency", currency)));
147    lore.add(Component.text(MessageConfig.yaml().getString("Messages.Note.Region").replace("$region", region)));
148    lore.add(Component.text(MessageConfig.yaml().getString("Messages.Note.Amount").replace("$amount", amount.toPlainString())));
149    lore.add(Component.text(MessageConfig.yaml().getString("Messages.Note.Action")));
150
151    return (AbstractItemStack<Object>)PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of(material, 1)
152            .customName(Component.text(MessageConfig.yaml().getString("Messages.Note.Name")))
153            .enchant(enchantments)
154            .flags(flags)
155            .modelDataOld(customModelData)
156            .lore(lore);
157  }
158}
